title: "Bard"'s role
body:
If we look at the previous champion releases there's something that can be noticed.

{{champion:421}}: Jungler
{{champion:429}}: ADC
{{champion:268}}: Mid Lane Mage
{{champion:150}}: Top Lane Fighter-thing
{{champion:201}}: Support
{{champion:161}}: Mid Lane Mage
{{champion:157}}: Mid Lane AD
{{champion:236}}: ADC
{{champion:222}}: ADC
{{champion:266}}: Top Lane Fighter
{{champion:127}}: Mid Lane Mage
{{champion:154}}: Jungler


There seems to be a minor pattern forming now, after the Lucian/Jinx release, where there is at least a whole (slightly varied) team comp released before the next cycle goes over.

Bard is more than likely going to be a Mid Lane AD, or a support.

Edit:: The downvotes, really?

replies.body:
lol no

forgetting, of course, the two straight adcs released prior to yasuo. There is no {{champion:86}} teed order.

Or a support. Mid lane AD's are generally assassins, and with the teaser was sounding, you don't really get an assassin feel off of it.  It sounds like a champion who has watched past events, for a loooooong time. Watching great empires fall and all that sort of stuff.

My guess is a mage-ish support.

> [{quoted}](name=Aziriously OP,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=PWh5YUAU,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-02-21T07:34:20.555+0000)
>
> It sounds like a champion who has watched past events, for a loooooong time. Watching great empires fall and all that sort of stuff.

{{champion:26}}: I knew you would do that.
As a bard, and the feel of the teaser, he will likely be a support, or at least some sort of protector like a tank. I hope it will be something a little different, like a jungle support
